comments: The free Tabnav Accessibility Checker is part of a broader accessibility solution, including an AI accessibility widget and a free WCAG learning platform. The tool follows W3C standards and is continuously refined based on user and community feedback.
features: Free web-based accessibility checker that scans any URL using automated testing. It identifies accessibility issues, explains each finding in clear language, and provides suggested fixes to help teams detect and understand accessibility barriers on web pages using common desktop browsers.
title: Free Web Accessibility Checker
